document_name: Decree No. 2006-0192/PR/MID setting up an institutional risk and disaster management framework
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DJI/2006/DJI-2006-07-23-Decree No. 2006-0192_PR_MID setting up an institutional risk and disaster management framework_d679a493dad39772c20b811c24e0ce27.pdf
document_description: This decree aims to establish an inter-sectoral institutional framework for risk and disaster management. For this it creates the following: An Interministerial Committee for Risk and Disaster Management, an inter-sectoral technical committee for risk and disaster management and an Executive Secretariat for Risk and Disaster Management.
